CreateBackupMigration.title: Creating a backup file import task

DeleteBackupMigration.title: Deleting a full backup import task

DeleteIncrementalMigration.title: Deleting an incremental backup import task

DescribeAccounts.title: Pulling the list of instance accounts

DescribeBackupCommand.document:
Used when transaction logs need an incremental import. What is acquired is a full backup that is not restored.
`\\\\n` in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the command of creating a full backup

DescribeBackupCommand.document:
This example shows you how to query the command to create a full backup and an incremental transaction log backup when you need to import the incremental transaction log backup. The full backup created does not need to be restored.
\\\\n in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the command of creating a full backup and an incremental transaction log backup

DescribeBackupCommand.document:
This example shows you how to query the command to create an incremental transaction log backup when you need to import it. The incremental transaction log backup created needs to be restored.
\\\\n in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the command of creating an incremental transaction log backup

DescribeBackupMigration.title: Querying a full backup import task
